elements.label: Kathryn, an acquaintance
elements.description: Kathryn lost her husband to the Great War and two limbs to a tactical bombardment at her factory. She now makes prosthetics for war veterans in need. [You might be able to recruit this acquaintance as a follower.]

elements.label: Kathryn, a believer
elements.description: Kathryn used to make simple, wooden pegs. She is now learning the intricacies of steel, fire and turning cogs.

elements.label: Kathryn, a disciple
elements.description: Kathryn's designs are becoming more elaborate by the day, and her synthetic limbs work as well as her real ones. Its' a matter of time before they surprass them.

elements.label: Kathryn, a Reshaper
elements.description: Kathryn has replaced the rest of her limbs with prosthetics. We've heard her muttering something about organ transplants.

elements.label: Kathryn, a Troublemaker
elements.description: Kathryn has decided we're stifling her progress.

elements.label: Kathryn, a Rival
elements.description: The horrors of war are far from a novelty for Kathryn.

elements.label: Kathryn, a Long in the Making
elements.description: 'Serving my country cost me an arm and a leg - quite literally. Your price will be much higher.'

elements.label: Kathryn, a Prisoner
elements.description: Kathryn constantly complains about pain in her missing leg.
